name: Backlight
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 51 following the theme "Every 10 Seconds."

Every 10 seconds, you receive a dash, three swings of your sword, and a burst to defeat your enemies! Use with caution.

WASD to move, space to dash, left shift to slash, and E to shoot your burst.

This game was made by:

eleven_scute_turtle

Gorbooo

DootleSoup
